professional_summary.hospitality: Reliable and tech-savvy professional with a strong background in precision work, facility operations, and independent problem-solving. Proven ability to maintain high standards of organization, communicate effectively with diverse teams, and adapt quickly to new software and protocols. Seeking a Front Desk or Guest Services position where accuracy, dependability, and a calm demeanor are valued.
professional_summary.general: Dependable and fast-learning worker with hands-on experience in finish carpentry, construction framing, and farm labor. Strong communication skills, a positive attitude, and a proven ability to work safely and effectively in team-based, fast-paced environments.

work_experience.title: Finish Carpentry Technician
responsibilities: Assembled custom cabinetry and woodworking components
Maintained shop organization and supported installations
Operated forklift and transported materials
Executed precision work requiring extreme attention to detail
Managed inventory and organized shop tools, ensuring safe and efficient workflow
Collaborated with clients and team members to ensure installations met expectations

work_experience.title: Framing Apprentice
responsibilities: Assisted with layout, measuring, cutting, and structural installation
Supported remodel and new-build projects
Maintained clean, safe job sites
Demonstrated reliability in fast-paced environments, consistently meeting project timelines
Maintained strict safety protocols (transferable to facility upkeep)
Worked effectively with minimal supervision, solving on-site logistical problems

work_experience.title: Farm Laborer / Ranch Operations
responsibilities: Cared for horses and poultry; maintained coops and feed systems
Loaded feed into barn, cleaned chicken pens, waterers, feeders
Groomed horses
Split and stacked firewood
Cut weeds and cared for fruit trees, picked fruit
Fence repair
Entrusted with sole responsibility for property oversight, livestock welfare, and facility security
Managed daily schedules and maintenance routines autonomously
Recognized for reliability, communication, and initiative

recommendation.quote: Ty is very willing to do whatever is needed as long as he is given instruction. He anticipates potential problems and communicates them. Ty is resourceful and very respectful.
